plot outline: Chanti is an innocent young man who is a worker in the house of a Zamindar family. The Zamindar brothers have a younger sister Nandini who loves Chanti and marries him. But due to his innocence, Chanti is unaware of their marriage and faces consequences from her brothers. Finally Chanti and Nandini gets united.
title: Chanti
plot: When an astrologer predicts that Nandini would marry a person of her choice, her possessive brothers decide to guard her. Can they stop her from marrying the person of her choice ?

_Chanti_ (qv) is an innocent young man who is a worker in the house of a Zamindar family. The Zamindar brothers have a younger sister Nandini who loves _Chanti_ (qv) and marries him. But due to his innocence, _Chanti_ (qv) is unaware of their marriage and faces consequences from her brothers. Finally _Chanti_ (qv) and Nandini gets united.::Samrudh David
